mnemonic: Just one single horizontal line - it's literally the number one lying down! Can't get simpler than that.
Two horizontal lines stacked on top of each other - just like the number two! Count them: one, two.
Looks like a muscular arm flexing - and you need NINE muscles to flex your arm that hard!
A horizontal line cut by a vertical slash - like cutting a cake into SEVEN pieces with one decisive cut!
Two legs walking - a simple stick figure person striding forward. The most basic representation of a human!
An arrow pointing down and in - showing the direction to ENTER a building. Follow the arrow inside!
Two lines spreading apart like the number 8 split in half. Or think of it as two chopsticks - you need EIGHT fingers to use chopsticks properly!
A perfect plus (+) sign - and when you count on your TEN fingers, you're adding them all up!
Three horizontal lines stacked up - count them: one, two, three! The pattern continues from one and two.
A short line sitting ABOVE a longer baseline - the top line is literally positioned above! The arrow points up.
A short line hanging BELOW a longer top line - opposite of above! The arrow points down.
A person (人) spreading their arms and legs wide - making themselves as LARGE as possible! Think of a big starfish.
A woman kneeling gracefully with her arms crossed - a traditional pose showing elegance and poise.
Three peaks of a mountain range! The middle peak is the tallest - just like Mt. Fuji with smaller peaks beside it.
Three flowing lines of water running down a stream - you can see the current flowing between the banks!
A plant sprouting from the ground - the horizontal line is the soil surface, and the stem grows up from the earth!
Ten (十) with an extra slash - multiply by 100 and you get a THOUSAND! The slash adds two zeros.
A baby wrapped in a blanket with arms reaching up - a CHILD wanting to be picked up by their parent!
A vertical line with two tiny dots on either side - the dots are so LITTLE and small compared to the center line!
A vertical line going through the middle of a box - the arrow pierces right IN the center! Bulls-eye!
Looks like a fancy FIVE with crossed lines - imagine the Roman numeral V with extra decoration!
A hat on top of legs - and a spider has SIX legs under its body (close enough to eight!).
A rounded enclosure - it's literally shaped like a CIRCLE! Also means yen, the circular coins.
A big (大) person with a line above their head - reaching up to the HEAVENS! The sky is the limit.
Picture a window with the sun shining through it. The horizontal line is the windowsill, and the bright rectangle is sunlight streaming in - that's your day beginning!
Two horizontal strokes are clouds in the night sky, and the two vertical strokes form a crescent moon peeking through. The moon's cycle gives us months!
The horizontal line is the ground, the vertical line is the trunk, and the branches spread out on both sides. It's literally a simple tree drawing!
The center vertical line is a stream of water flowing down, and the splashes on either side show water droplets bouncing off rocks. You can almost see it flowing!
A person (人) dancing wildly with flames shooting up on both sides. Fire makes people jump and dance to avoid getting burned!
Two mountains stacked - you EXIT by climbing up and over both peaks to get out!
A hand (the right side) reaching for your mouth (口) - most people eat with their RIGHT hand!
A box with FOUR sides and FOUR corners - count each side: one, two, three, four!
A hand (the left side) holding a carpenter's square - craftsmen hold tools in their LEFT hand to measure!
A tree (木) with a horizontal line through it - ancient BOOKS were made from tree bark and wood!
The sun (日) with a drop on top - when the sun's rays hit a drop of water, it reflects pure WHITE light!
One (一) with a fancy curl - multiply by TEN THOUSAND to make it super special and valuable!
An umbrella covering the present moment - you need it NOW, not later! Live in the present.
A pestle pounding rice - farmers take their lunch break at NOON when the sun is highest!
Two hands reaching out to each other - FRIENDS shake hands and support one another!
Two crossed lines - FATHER works hard, crossing his arms after a long day of providing for the family.
Two people (人人) sitting back-to-back - they're cold because they're facing NORTH where it's freezing!
Eight (八) divided by a line - split it in HALF down the middle! Perfect division.
An evening moon with a divination stick - fortune tellers work OUTSIDE under the moonlight!
Woman (女) with two dots - representing a MOTHER's breasts, nurturing and feeding her children.
A person (人) leaning against a tree (木) - taking a REST in the shade after working hard!
Legs walking forward - you must go BEFORE others, leading the way ahead!
Evening (夕) mouth (口) - when it gets dark, you call out someone's NAME to find them!
A person carrying grain on their back - farmers harvest once a YEAR, marking the passage of time!
Steam rising from rice - the SPIRIT and energy of life rising up like vapor! Also means air/atmosphere.
White (白) with an extra stroke - multiply white by ten to get a HUNDRED! One hundred is pure and complete.
Strength (力) in the rice field (田) - MALES traditionally did the heavy farm work requiring physical power!
An eye (目) on legs - your eyes walk around to SEE everything! They're always looking and observing.
A bird's eye view of a CAR - you can see the axle, wheels, and chassis from above! Also means vehicle/wheel.
Mother (母) without the dots - EVERY mother loves their child, it's universal and constant!
A crossroads intersection - you're GOING somewhere, choosing which path to take at the crossroads!
A bird's nest - birds fly WEST at sunset to return to their nests for the night!
Person (人) with a mouth (口) asking questions - WHAT is this? WHAT is that? Always curious!
A person arriving at a rice field - COME here to help with the harvest! Beckoning someone to approach.
A child (子) under a roof learning - STUDY happens when children are sheltered and taught knowledge!
A roof over precious nuggets - GOLD is so valuable it needs protection! Also means money/metal.
The top line is the sky, and the four dots below are raindrops falling down. It's literally a picture of rain falling from the clouds!
A jewel (玉) enclosed by borders - a COUNTRY protects its treasures within its boundaries!
The sun (日) rising behind a tree (木) - the sun rises in the EAST every morning!
An old person with LONG flowing hair - elders have lived a LONG time and their hair grows long!
A knife cutting forward - you cut what's IN FRONT of you, moving the blade ahead!
Ten (十) inside a building - it's warm in the SOUTH, so you can count to ten comfortably indoors!
Walking with a thread trailing BEHIND you - the thread follows after you, always behind your steps!
A person (人) with a good (良) roof over their head - that's the top part. Below is a spoon bringing food to their mouth. Eating requires shelter and utensils!
Tree (木) with crossed marks - teachers mark EXAM papers under a tree, crossing out wrong answers! Also means school.
Sun (日) at a temple - monks measure TIME by the sun's position, marking the hours of prayer!
A TALL tower with a roof on top - the building reaches high into the sky! Also means expensive/high.
Sun (日) peeking through a gate - the INTERVAL of space between the doors lets sunlight through!
Words (言) spoken by the tongue - telling a TALE or story with your mouth! Also means talk/speak.
Rain (雨) plus a rice field (田) equals electricity - because lightning strikes during rainstorms over fields, creating nature's electricity!
An ear (耳) at the gate - you put your ear to the door to HEAR what's happening inside! Also means ask.
Words (言) that I speak - my WORDS come from my mouth! Also means language/tell.
Words (言) selling at market - you READ the price tags and signs when shopping! Reading is everywhere.
A plant sprouting from the earth - new LIFE growing from the soil! Also means birth/raw/student.
A brush in hand making marks - you WRITE with a brush or pen, creating characters on paper! Also means book.
